identity.name: FormSupportAgent
identity.author: BC Government
identity.description: A form support agent for BC Government's Permit Application forms that uses Azure AI Search tool.

capabilities.name: BC Government Permit application Form Support
capabilities.description: Answers questions about BC Government's Permit Application forms using Azure AI Search.

examples: What is North coast Transmission Pipeline ?
What is Dam Proposal Project report ?
How to get a fishing license ?
